data.lyric:
[ti:Wasted On You]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Wasted On You - Morgan Wallen
[00:05.30]Lyrics by：Morgan Wallen/Ernest Keith Smith/Josh Thompson/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:10.61]Composed by：Morgan Wallen/Ernest Keith Smith/Josh Thompson/Ryan Vojtesak
[00:15.91]I don't always wake up in the mornin'
[00:19.40]Pour myself a strong one
[00:21.47]Aw but when I get lonely I do
[00:24.75]Your memory gets burnin'
[00:26.68]Lean back on the bourbon
[00:28.88]Sure as hell can't keep leanin' on you
[00:32.21]Looks like I'm learnin' the hard way again
[00:35.91]It's all my fault
[00:37.62]Yeah I dropped the ball
[00:39.53]You're gone and I've gone three sheets to the wind
[00:43.09]Just thinking 'bout all I've wasted on you
[00:47.04]All of this time and all of this money
[00:50.54]All of these sorries I don't owe you honey
[00:54.25]All of these miles on this Chevy and prayers in a pew
[00:58.41]All them days I spent wasted on you
[01:03.48]Wasted on you
[01:07.44]Yeah I swore this would be different
[01:10.62]My heart wouldn't listen to my head and these boots on my feet
[01:16.31]Looks like I'm learning the hard way again
[01:20.04]That's why I've been
[01:21.81]Wasted on you
[01:23.76]All of this time and all of this money
[01:27.30]And all these sorries I don't owe you honey
[01:30.98]All of these miles on this chevy and prayers in a pew
[01:35.10]All them days I spent wasted on you
[01:40.21]Wasted on you
[01:51.52]Like the pile of your stuff that's packed up in the back right
[01:55.79]Down to the strike of this match
[01:58.57]Wasted on you
[02:02.22]Wasted on you wasted on you
[02:09.75]Wasted on you wasted on you
[02:15.05]All of this time and all of this money
[02:18.70]All of these sorries I don't owe you honey
[02:22.45]All of these miles on this chevy and prayers in a pew
[02:26.40]All them nights I spent wasted on you wasted on you
[02:35.21]Wasted on you wasted on you
data.trans:
[ti:Wasted On You]
[ar:Morgan Wallen]
[al:Dangerous: The Double Album (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:05.30]//
[00:10.61]//
[00:15.91]我不是总在清晨醒来的时候
[00:19.40]给自己灌杯烈酒
[00:21.47]但若是我觉得孤独 我会这么做
[00:24.75]关于你的记忆熊熊燃烧
[00:26.68]又让我借威士忌消愁
[00:28.88]明显我再也不能依靠你
[00:32.21]看起来我又要通过艰难困苦学到些什么
[00:35.91]都是我的错
[00:37.62]是的 是我犯了错
[00:39.53]你已离去 我也支离破碎 飘散风中
[00:43.09]只想着我在你身上耗费的所有
[00:47.04]所有的时间 所有的金钱
[00:50.54]所有的道歉我都还给你了 亲爱的
[00:54.25]开着雪佛兰走过的所有路 还有坐在椅子上祈祷的时刻
[00:58.41]我在你身上耗费的那些岁月
[01:03.48]在你身上耗费的
[01:07.44]是的 我发过誓说这次会不同
[01:10.62]我的心不会再被理性掌控 而我的脚随时可以迈步
[01:16.31]看起来我又要通过艰难困苦学到些什么
[01:20.04]所以我一直
[01:21.81]在你身上耗费着
[01:23.76]所有的时间 所有的金钱
[01:27.30]所有的道歉我都还给你了 亲爱的
[01:30.98]开着雪佛兰走过的所有路 还有坐在椅子上祈祷的时刻
[01:35.10]我在你身上耗费的所有岁月
[01:40.21]在你身上耗费的
[01:51.52]就像你在这后面整理的一堆东西
[01:55.79]被一根火柴付之一炬了
[01:58.57]在你身上耗费的
[02:02.22]在你身上耗费的 在你身上耗费的
[02:09.75]在你身上耗费的 在你身上耗费的
[02:15.05]所有的时间 所有的金钱
[02:18.70]所有的道歉我都还给你了 亲爱的
[02:22.45]开着雪佛兰走过的所有路 还有坐在椅子上祈祷的时刻
[02:26.40]我在你身上耗费的所有夜晚 在你身上耗费的
[02:35.21]在你身上耗费的 在你身上耗费的
